org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text

Class Formats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text.Formats

  • public final class Formats
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility classes for event formats.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Detail

      • delimitedRatings

        public static DelimitedColumnEventFormat delimitedRatings(java.lang.String delim)
        A basic format of ratings in a CSV file. The expected format is (user, item, rating, timestamp), where the timestamp is optional.
        Parameters:
        delim - The delimiter.
        Returns:
        An event format for reading ratings from a CSV file.

      • csvRatings

        public static DelimitedColumnEventFormat csvRatings()
        A basic format of ratings in a CSV file. The expected format is (user, item, rating, timestamp), where the timestamp is optional.
        Returns:
        An event format for reading ratings from a CSV file.

      • ml100kFormat

        public static DelimitedColumnEventFormat ml100kFormat()
        Get a format for reading the ML-100K data set.
        Returns:
        A format for using TextEventDAO to read the ML-100K data set.

      • movieLensFormat

        public static DelimitedColumnEventFormat movieLensFormat()
        Get a format for reading the MovieLens data sets (other than 100K).
        Returns:
        A format for using TextEventDAO to read the ML-1M and ML-10M data sets.
